attributes.additional_details: Parliament should make it a life sentence mean life. If a teenager commits murder , they can be out on the streets before the age of 50 . This is so wrong. Just think if someone killed someone you know, they should never walk the streets again.
attributes.background: DNA evidence is so strong these days, that anyone proved beyond doubt of murder . Should get a full life sentence. Why should they only get 25yrs for taking someone's life??.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Replace life sentences with whole life terms for the most serious offenders
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732705
